name: BlackDuckDetect
description: Execute Black Duck Detect against your build
author: Black Duck Software, Inc.
instanceNameFormat: Run Black Duck Detect for your build $(message)

inputs.name: BlackDuckHubService
inputs.label: Black Duck Hub Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Black Duck Hub end point to use. Click on 'manage' and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'Black Duck Hub'

inputs.name: BlackDuckHubProxyService
inputs.label: Black Duck Hub Proxy Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Black Duck proxy to use. Click on 'manage' and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'Black Duck Hub Proxy'

inputs.name: DetectVersion
inputs.label: Detect Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the detect binary to use. Default: Latest.

inputs.name: DetectArguments
inputs.label: Detect Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional detect arguments. Newline or space to seperate. Use double quotes to escape. Can use environment and build variables.

inputs.name: DetectFolder
inputs.label: Detect Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location to download the detect jar or the location of an existing detect jar. Default: System temp directory.

inputs.name: AddTaskSummary
inputs.label: Add Detect Task Summary
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, will add a summary of the detect task to the build summary tab.
